import "./dashboard.css" import Card from "../card/card.js" import Featured from "./images/Featured.svg" import Avatar from "./images/Avatar.svg" const Dashboard = () => { return(
Discover, Collect, Sell and Create your NFT
Digital marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens
John Abraham
Brighten LQ
Auction time
Current Bid
:
0.05 ETH
3h 1m 50s
0.15 ETH
Trending Bids
All
Artwork
Music
) } export default Dashboard;
